description: Office or other outpatient visit for the evaluation and management of an established patient
text_chunk: Office or other outpatient visit for the evaluation and management of an established patient, which requires a medically appropriate history and/or examination and low level of medical decision making.

description: Office or other outpatient visit for the evaluation and management of an established patient
text_chunk: Office or other outpatient visit for the evaluation and management of an established patient, which requires a medically appropriate history and/or examination and moderate level of medical decision making.

description: Collection of venous blood by venipuncture
text_chunk: Collection of venous blood by venipuncture. Standard blood draw procedure using a needle to collect blood from a vein.

description: Radiologic examination, chest, 2 views, frontal and lateral
text_chunk: Radiologic examination, chest, 2 views, frontal and lateral. Standard chest X-ray with two views.
Blood count; complete (CBC), automated. Complete blood count with differential performed by automated methods.
Comprehensive metabolic panel. Blood chemistry panel including glucose, electrolytes, kidney and liver function tests.

description: Electrocardiogram, routine ECG with at least 12 leads
text_chunk: Electrocardiogram, routine ECG with at least 12 leads; with interpretation and report.
Colonoscopy, flexible; diagnostic, including collection of specimen(s) by brushing or washing, when performed.

description: Ultrasound, abdominal, real time with image documentation
text_chunk: Ultrasound, abdominal, real time with image documentation; complete ultrasound examination of the abdomen.
Arthroscopy, knee, surgical; with meniscectomy (medial AND lateral, including any meniscal shaving) including debridement/shaving of articular cartilage.
